author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Town (City) - Coast Guard HQ Review
review:
This set is a great set to have and a good addition to any LEGO city for sure. We get lot's of stuff like a boat, a rubber boat, a jeep, a motorcycle, a helicopter and the headquarters. We also get a palm tree, a shark and a dolphin in this set. The rubber boat has an engine on the back but it doesn't have many play features. The jeep has a flag, an orange life-saver and a walkie-talkie on the back. The motorcycle also has a flag and a life-saver on the back and the helicopter has a life-saver on the side. The blades of the helicopter sviwel full 360Â° and the cockpit can be removed very easily. The boat which comes with this set is able to float on water and it also has a flag on the back which sviwels. There's also a life-saver on each side and the windscreen can be removed very easily. On the back you can also see a platform where you can put the rubber boat.

The main thing in this set is the headquarters. The gate of the garage opens and on the top you can also see a platform for the helicopter. There's also a place where you can store the camera and the stretcher. We also get a red and a green flag which you can put on a sign which shows you if you're allowed to swim there. The main building has an office in the inside with a screen, a seat and a nice looking aquarium which has a fish in the inside. The balcony on the top has a camera which sviwels, a yellow life jacket and a telescope which sviwels. This set is an easy build and we also get a few stickers which you have to put on the boat. As I told you in the beginning: It's a great set to have!

All in all this set is an great set and I would HIGHLY recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de
